plot: A loner, whose parents died years ago, lives all alone doing petty jobs for survival. He meets Nadeem and Dawood and his whole life takes a turn to insanity.
title: Akela the Alone
plot_es: A loner, whose parents died years ago, lives all alone doing petty jobs for survival. He meets Nadeem and Dawood and his whole life takes a turn to insanity.
plot_en: A loner, whose parents died years ago, lives all alone doing petty jobs for survival. He meets Nadeem and Dawood and his whole life takes a turn to insanity.
